content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for considering my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent in Munich and I am confident that my apartment will meet your needs. In terms of the rental price, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, as a landlord, I must emphasize that I am looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. That being said, I am open to discussing different rental prices and am willing to work with you to find a price that you are comfortable with and that I can agree to. Would you like to propose a rental price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I propose 600 Euros per month. [

I understand that you are looking to maximize your gains from renting out the apartment. However, I am willing to work with you to find a price that we can both agree on. Therefore, I propose a rental price of 600 Euros per month. This price is reasonable and should cover all the expenses related to renting the apartment, including utilities and maintenance. I would like to negotiate this price and see if we can come to an agreement.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your proposal, Bo Li. While 600 Euros per month is certainly a reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich, I am still looking to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment. I understand that you are willing to negotiate, but I am afraid that 600 Euros per month may not be sufficient for me to cover all the expenses related to renting the apartment. Therefore, I would like to propose a higher rental price. Would you be willing to consider a rental price of 700 Euros per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can accept 700 Euros per month.

I understand that you are looking for a higher rental price to cover expenses. However, I am willing to accept a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This price is still reasonable and should cover all the expenses related to renting the apartment, including utilities and maintenance. I would like to agree to this price and move forward with the negotiation process.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for your willingness to accept a rental price of 700 Euros per month, Bo Li. I appreciate your understanding and cooperation in this matter. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for considering my apartment for rent and for your interest in Munich. I am confident that this rental arrangement will be mutually beneficial for both of us. Would you like to proceed with the negotiation process and sign the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine
